column1: #Text=Asami says : " Are you sure this is a good idea ? "
#Text=Mako says : " No , but it 's our last resort . "
#Text=I 'm running an off - the - books operation , and I thought the Triple Threats might want a piece of the action .
#Text=" Triple Threat doorman says : " How big a piece ?
#Text=" Viper says : " So Mr. Law and Order needs our help , huh ?
#Text=What 's in it for the Triple Threats ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I am personal friends with that Avatar .
#Text=I might be able to convince her to give Shady Shin his bending back .
#Text=" Shady Shin says : " Sounds good to me , boss .
#Text=" Viper says : " What about the rest of us ?
#Text=" Asami says : " I 've got vehicles , all brand - new and top of the line .
#Text=They can be yours if you help .
#Text=" Viper says : " I think we got ourselves a deal .
